headline: Top Research Reports for Exxon Mobil, Bristol-Myers Squibb & Chubb
summary: Today's Research Daily features new research reports on 16 major stocks, including Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM), Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY) and Chubb Limited (CB), as well as a micro-cap stock Hamilton Beach Brands Holding Company (HBB).

headline: Laser-Focus on These Tariff-Proof Stocks Before It’s Too Late
summary: Hello, Reader. In 1939, the British government wanted to boost public morale before the outbreak of World War II. So, they created a series of posters that featured simple motivational sayings. headline: Is Bristol Myers Squibb's High-Yielding Dividend Safe?
summary: High-yielding dividend stocks can be great investments to hold on to in your portfolio, but only if they're safe.  Betting on a high yield can be dangerous because if it ends up getting cut, you could lose all or most of the dividend income, and the stock may crash in the process as dividend investors could look elsewhere for a high payout.  Healthcare giant Bristol Myers Squibb (NYSE: BMY) provides investors with a fairly high yield today -- 4.1%.
